title.narrative: CHILD POVERTY AND CRM

description.narrative: Output 1. By 2025, government institutions have enhanced capacities to systematically collect, analyse and use disaggregated data to inform policy development and report on the situation of children, with a special focus on vulnerable children and their families, which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Evaluation, Evaluation (Covid), Reducing Child Poverty, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Partnerships And Engagement: Public And Private, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, children and their families benefit from improved and adequately funded social protection and inclusion systems and enhanced child rights monitoring

Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 1. By 2025, government institutions have enhanced capacities to systematically collect, analyse and use disaggregated datato inform policy development and report on the situation of children, with a special focus on vulnerable children and theirfamilies

description.narrative: UNICEF initiated development of two entity-level comprehensive strategies of social protection, in cooperation with entity Ministries of SP and entity-level Associations of social workers. These strategies will be the first of its kind in the country and combine strategic goals of several domains of social protection system in BiH. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:11/01/2022

title.narrative: Policies and programmes are influenced by analysis and advocacy to reduce child poverty, Text

baseline.value: Child poverty measures are being used in ongoing policy discussions and/or advocacy but have not yet led to changes in policies and programmes for children

target.value: 2022:Evidence and advocacy on child poverty influence ongoing policy discussions and the development of Social Protection Strategies at entity levels

actual.value: 2021:SI Strategies finalized; development of entity Strategies on Social Protection initiated with child poverty embedded.

title.narrative: Multidimensional child poverty is routinely measured and reported by the government, Text

baseline.value: No regular measurement of child poverty at the country-wide level

target.value: 2022: Advocacy around the importance of multi-dimensional child poverty measurement influenced national surveys

actual.value: 2021:Capacity of statistical institutions at all levels remains very limited.
